TopicTitle: Kerbal Wars: Battlefront II. What's yours?

Articles.Content:
(Hopefully this is the right section)

Hi everyone!

Last night I was scrolling through Instagram (yes, I'm one of those) and I found an interesting post. It was captioned "The last two games you played have merged into one... How bad did it turn out?" The OP had GTA V and Mario Kart 

As this is the KSP forums, lets keep it to Kerbal Space Program and X. So, what game did you last play other than KSP? Do they mix well?

 

Mine was the original Star Wars Battlefront II... So, I guess Kerbal Klones using blasters?

CS GO, meaning we are going to have to take out some kerbal terrorists... IN SPACE

Edited May 5, 2017 by Sputnik 1
Overkerb, I guess overwatch, with rockets?
Mission: ISS.  Mixed fairly well, as I'm working on a space station already.

Kwent.  Open beta coming soon. 

Edited May 6, 2017 by klgraham1013

FTB: Realism Overhaul Expert Mode, I'm still trying to figure out where a tin deposit is so I can eventually create bronze from native copper. Doing an actual launch is probably a task outside of my lifetime, I hope my daughter can continue my legacy.
Infini Space Program Factory. It's like KSP, but ships get built by automated assembly lines?
Ehm, Kelite Dangerous? Elite Space Program? No idea, however, one thing is sure. We're going to Space!
I last played Avakin life.[3d roleplaying game] (on Android). Mixing with KSP? Kerbal Life? That would be amazing.

Mass Effect:Kerbol

A bunch of aliens journey to the Kerbol system in <whatever> galaxy and meet a race of tiny green spacemen in cobbled together ships full of snacks.

 

/Not sure if it has ever been specified what galaxy the Kerbol system is in.

MineKerbal: Regrowth.

Maybe I have to rebuild the world enough to leave it to its own devices?
Kerallis? Stellaris and Kerbals? Kerbal Stellaris? but there's already a mod for that in Stellaris. BUT ITS FUN!
Kerbal Civilization VI - the sixth attempt to bring kerbals from the ancient era into the space age without sterilizing the planet in the process. Notice the Ring Sea? That was an earlier Civ...

Counter Strike Kerbal Offensive - Engineers and Scientists taken hostage and plenty of our top secret crafts are in danger of being destroyed, it is up to Supreme Commander Jeb to lead a Counter Terrorist group to retaliate against the evil doers.
Ha, some good ones on here guys lets keep 'em coming!

The Legend of Kerbal: Breath of the Mun

or alternatively

The Legend of Jebediah: Breath of the Kerbal

Edited May 6, 2017 by Alshain
Preykerb. Kerbals attacked by mimics in space..
MunKraft: A game where you have to kraft a space axe and a orbital pickaxe. Remember to kraft a sword to protect against zerbals. And the space kraken

That would be  KSP meetsYandere Simulator : Yandere Space Program

Clearly, a yandere on board would turn any Duna mission in a remake od Dead Space.
Elder Scrolls V: Kerbol
Rocket Kerbal-Like Rocket League but with the ability to customize the car any way you want it like the rockets and planes in KSP!
Kerbal X-Plane Program
Shadowrun: Flight Simulator?

Kortal II?

I don't know, but I think one of the things is quite happy in SPAAAAAAAAAAACE.

Kerbal Civilization VI

Edited May 7, 2017 by Oliverm001x
